Class WarMenu.Dice

    private final class WarMenu.Dice
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles displaying the dice on the screen.

        Adds dice to WarMenu with there designated Point position.
        Parameters:
        attackerDiceRolls - The values of the dice to be displayed.
        defenderDiceRolls - The values of the dice to be displayed.
        attackTop - The Point of the top dice for the attacker.
        defendTop - The Point of the top dice for the defender.
